Reviews.Title: Good telephone
Reviews.Author: Cristiano Torchio
Reviews.Content: This is my first smart phone and I'm very happy with it. The quality of plastic is good the finishes too, the screen is resistant....so far.I don't understand why this people says:"when you insert your card you will never be able to open it again"I have been taking it out and in several times to copy files from and to it and it works excellent.I can do some adjustment to excel and word documents and then copy them to the pc with no problems.I love the gps and it works great.You can open and close the case as much as you want.It's fast enough for me, well some times it takes more to load an image or change screen.This time samsung have my respect.

Reviews.Title: The cell phone works great in Argentina and US
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: I use this cell phone every day in Argentina and US, it is a good cell phone and the cost-benefits relationship is great, i recommend this product to others.Uso este celular a diario tanto en Argentina como en US, es un buen equipo y la relacion costo-beneficio es muy buena, recomiendo este producto.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Vanquor "EQUBE"
Reviews.Content: Is one of the best low-end cellphones I ever had. I'm gonna be using this for a good time.I thought it was too fragile, because it weights nothing, but, after a little accident, it was ok.I totaly recommend this phone, is practic and easy to handle.

Reviews.Title: Good Cell Phone, But battery power...
Reviews.Author: J. Cardenas Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: Obtained from my telephone carrier in a package ($) of 18 months. I used for an 8 months and have no complains for the phone. Android Froyo 2.2 was upgraded automatically by KIES (Samsung) in two steps. all the functions works well, but the power drain faster. even disabled Wi-fi, GPS, and used an app to keep the battery optimized. Really, 2 days is for most the time with full charge. sensible touchscreen, medium size, used daily. some times you can feel heat in the cover for the continue use. You need to put inside an SD card (16gb class 4)to use for keep photos, videos, music, and other kind of files obtained by internet. I recommend this cell phone, is very useful when it's charged. Greetings

Reviews.Title: Queenie
Reviews.Author: Quinton
Reviews.Content: Look good  work good have no regret getting this phone  camera very clear gps work fine this phone  came unlocked I had it for  a short time until someone stole it

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: Pol
Reviews.Content: This cellphone is very beautiful, it has a good design and it fits perfect, I love it, I recommend this cellphone

Reviews.Title: I love It
Reviews.Author: Patricia P.
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, very good quality. I received on time and very good protected. It is a simple but powerful phone at a time. My sister loves it

Reviews.Title: Phone is great for my purpose.  Few other things I still have to figure out.
Reviews.Author: Viola M.
Reviews.Content: After adjusting and buying a SD memory card I was able to send & receive pictures.  I wasn't plan on getting a phone that I needed a SD memory card.

Reviews.Title: Didn't last for long
Reviews.Author: Daniel B.
Reviews.Content: This phone didn't last for longer than 7months before it started acting up. I will not recommend anybody to bug this phone.

Reviews.Title: A real eye opener
Reviews.Author: michael small
Reviews.Content: Never had a smart phone before, didn't think I needed one. I was forced by my wife to buy a smart phone, the Samsung galaxy fit 5670. For $106.00 refurbished its value for money. The aps are user friendly and my friends just love my phone. One of them stole it and Breed provided some valuable info and it was recovered. Be careful with your galaxy fit, you are not the only loving it.

Reviews.Title: worse cell phone ever
Reviews.Author: TheSword
Reviews.Content: This is by far the worse cell phone I've ever hadIt have fancy characteristics as any Android phone but...-if you need to call to a voice machine, then welcome to hell! the screen turns off while you are trying to push numbers, no matter what you do . It can't be configurated to stop doing so.-If you talk with it near your ear, be aware this thing will stop the call by confuse your ear with your finger!- if it some cold out there this phone miss your finger touchs all time-sometimes the phone hides the button "Stop" for no reason- its screen get broken tooo easily- you cant see anything under just some sun lightetc etc etcoverall a good fancy android station but a TERRIBLE phone

Reviews.Title: okay for what it is
Reviews.Author: da_bunny
Reviews.Content: I bought the phone to upgrade to the smartphone phase as a test run. The first one I got, the screen was unresponsive. The second was a little better, but after a few months the reaction from the screen did decrease in productivity. All in all the phone is pretty durable, it still works even after it has been dropped a few times on accident!

Reviews.Title: I looks nice tho
Reviews.Author: Riceboy
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone 4 someone special though there is no double cam there,is only camera on the back not on the front screen side

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Nazareth Hernandez
Reviews.Content: very good product, and the estimated transfer passed off without inconvenience. fully recommend buying through this company, very responsible ..

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Phone
Reviews.Author: Kay Gairy
Reviews.Content: The phone worked very well for a long time however the memory is not enough so it has slowed down considerably. It was good while it lasted.

Reviews.Title: Be aware of this guy
Reviews.Author: Minami
Reviews.Content: Be careful of this product if you want to buy low-end smartphone here.The fit looks good, but the back case has the problem. After you insert your battery and sim card, then you are unable to open it again.The back cover case is impossible to open that I think it is the defective design for Samsung.Fortunately, The amazon have a great return policy,and refund to me.  Thanks Amazon. Otherwise, I will be deceived by samsung.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG GALAXY S5670
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this product as a gift for my husband. It's a great cell phone. It works ok but I don't like its appeareance. I don't like the application for playing the music. And it doesn't open the index of the documents with Word. I prefer my blackberry 9550.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile.
Mobile Phone Platform Band GSM & EDGE Band 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 MHz Band. HSDPA 900 / 2,100 MHz Band
Android 2.2 OS, Processor 600MHz. Connectivity: Wi-Fi 802.11 (b/g/n), Bluetooth technology v 2.1.
Display: 3.31" 320x240 QVGA TFT
Additional Features: Quicktype by SWYPE, Quick Office (Document Viewer), Multi-touch zoom, FM Radio (RDS)
3.31-inch TFT LCD display
Android 2.2 OS, Processor 600MHz. Connectivity: Wi-Fi 802.11 (b/g/n), Bluetooth technology v 2.1; 320x240
Camera: 5.0 MP AF Camera, QVGA@15fps, Codec : MPEG4, H.263, H.264. Music: 3.5mm Ear Jack & Speaker, MP3, AAC, AAC+, eAAC+ .
Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Fit S5670 Unlocked Phone with Android OS, 5MP Camera, GPS, Wi-Fi and FM Radio
